Text:
Forgive my ignorance, but do "PGS subtitles" mean that the Romanian (?) in the beginning / intro (and the scene with the female vampire(s) are hardcoded, as it should be? I looked "PGS" up, and it seems like they should be present, but I have tried to download approx. 5 copies of this movie, and only the 700mb version got the subs right! 

Thanks,
--B

to tell the truth i post what comes with the movie because a few people asked me to post the type thats in the movie  i do.some people prefer pgs some srt files me i could care less.as long as they work on the bluray player or WD player i have .leave a post if you want to know if anything is or language is ever hardcoded in before you download
